main.description: A taxonomic determination (identification) for an occurrence. Follows Darwin Core Identification class (dwc:Identification).

subject.description: A strong reference (CID + URI) to the occurrence record being identified.

scientificName.description: The full scientific name being proposed for the occurrence (Darwin Core dwc:scientificName).

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in scientificName (Darwin Core dwc:taxonRank).

identificationQualifier.description: A brief phrase or term qualifying the identification, such as 'cf.' or 'aff.' (Darwin Core dwc:identificationQualifier).

taxonID.description: An identifier for the set of taxon information. May be a URI to GBIF, iNaturalist, or other taxonomic authority (Darwin Core dwc:taxonID).

identificationRemarks.description: Comments or notes about the identification (Darwin Core dwc:identificationRemarks).

identificationVerificationStatus.description: A categorical indicator of the extent to which the taxonomic identification has been verified (Darwin Core dwc:identificationVerificationStatus).

typeStatus.description: A nomenclatural type designation for the specimen (Darwin Core dwc:typeStatus).

isAgreement.description: If true, this identification agrees with the current leading identification rather than proposing a different one. Not a Darwin Core term but useful for community consensus.

dateIdentified.description: The date on which the identification was made (Darwin Core dwc:dateIdentified). ISO 8601 format.
